caption: Policy Analysis
description: The Policy Analysis object describes details about the analysis performed on a Policy i.e. AWS IAM Policy, GCP IAM Policy, etc.
name: policy_analysis

condition.description: The condition that was evaluated in the policy.

granted_actions.description: The actions that were granted by the policy.

policy.description: Details about the policy that triggered the finding.

unused_actions_num.description: The number of unused actions in the policy.

unused_services_num.description: The number of unused services in the policy.
